name: darktable
description: [darktable]({{ project_url }}) is an open source photography workflow application and raw developer. A virtual lighttable and darkroom for photographers. It manages your digital negatives in a database, lets you view them through a zoomable lighttable and enables you to develop raw images and enhance them.

env.description: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.

volumes.description: Users home directory in the container, stores program settings and images

readme-vars.project_blurb: [darktable]({{ project_url }}) is an open source photography workflow application and raw developer. A virtual lighttable and darkroom for photographers. It manages your digital negatives in a database, lets you view them through a zoomable lighttable and enables you to develop raw images and enhance them.

param_env_vars.desc: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.

param_volumes.desc: Users home directory in the container, stores program settings and images

opt_security_opt_param_vars.desc: For Docker Engine only, many modern gui apps need this to function on older hosts as syscalls are unknown to Docker.

readme-vars.app_setup_block:
The application can be accessed at:

* http://yourhost:3000/

By default the user/pass is abc/abc, if you change your password or want to login manually to the GUI session for any reason use the following link:

* http://yourhost:3000/?login=true

changelogs.desc: Rebase to Alpine 3.16, migrate to s6v3.

setup:

By default the user/pass is abc/abc, if you change your password or want to login manually to the GUI session for any reason use the following link:

title: Darktable
